titles.title: Nampa and Meridian Conveyance Act
Nampa and Meridian Conveyance Act
To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain facilities to Nampa and Meridian Irrigation District.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 106-870.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 523.

bill.summary: 9/20/2000--Reported to House amended. Nampa and Meridian Conveyance Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the Nampa and Meridian Irrigation District certain facilities, including the water distribution and drainage system that is operated and maintained by the District for delivery and drainage of water for District lands.
